welcome: Welcome to Rajac Language School Admission
instructions: Fill out the admission form below.
qrHint: Scan to open the admission portal

home.title: Welcome To Rajac International Schools
home.description: Welcome to our admission portal. Please choose your access level below.

outlook.title: Book Your Admission Test Slot
outlook.saveError: Could not save your test slot. Please try again.
outlook.calendarNote: This test slot will be reflected in your Outlook calendar soon.

admin.search: Search by Father's Name or Student Name...

success.title: Account Created
success.reminder: Please take a screenshot or photo of this screen.
success.note: You will need these credentials when your son is approved

dashboard.title: Parent Dashboard
dashboard.passedMessage: Congratulations! Please bring original documents for verification at the school.
dashboard.failedMessage: We appreciate your interest. Please check admin notes for further information.
dashboard.reviewMessage: Your application is being reviewed. Please check back for updates on your exam schedule and results.

form.title: Admission Form
form.thankYou: Thank you! Your application has been received.
